alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 1:08AM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills of 25 to 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Custer and Fallon. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Expect snow to cause slick roads and areas of poor visibility. This includes I-94 and US-12. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More snow, possibly a few inches, is possible from Miles City to Baker Wednesday night through Thursday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
